feed.title: Security Advisory for Python packages hosted at PyPI.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for Python packages hosted at PyPI.org on GitHub

entry.title: [salt] SaltStack Salt Improper Certificate Validation
entry.content:
In SaltStack Salt before 3002.5, authentication to VMware vcenter, vsphere, and esxi servers (in the vmware.py files) does not always validate the SSL/TLS certificate.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-28972
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2021/11/msg00009.html
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/202103-01
  • https://www.debian.org/security/2021/dsa-5011
  • https://github.com/saltstack/salt/blob/8f9405cf8e6f7d7776d5000841c886dec6d96250/CHANGELOG.md?plain=1#L2358
  • https://github.com/saltstack/salt/blob/8f9405cf8e6f7d7776d5000841c886dec6d96250/doc/topics/releases/3000.7.rst#L14
  • https://github.com/saltstack/salt/blob/8f9405cf8e6f7d7776d5000841c886dec6d96250/doc/topics/releases/3001.5.rst#L14
  • https://github.com/saltstack/salt/blob/8f9405cf8e6f7d7776d5000841c886dec6d96250/doc/topics/releases/3002.3.rst#L14
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce%40lists.fedoraproject.org/message/7GRVZ5WAEI3XFN2BDTL6DDXFS5HYSDVB
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce%40lists.fedoraproject.org/message/FUGLOJ6NXLCIFRD2JTXBYQEMAEF2B6XH

entry.title: [salt] SaltStack Salt command injection via a crafted process name
entry.content:
An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. The minion's restartcheck is vulnerable to command injection via a crafted process name. This allows for a local privilege escalation by any user able to create a files on the minion in a non-blacklisted directory.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-28243
  • https://github.com/stealthcopter/CVE-2020-28243
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2021/11/msg00009.html
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2022/01/msg00000.html
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/202103-01
  • https://www.debian.org/security/2021/dsa-5011
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/202310-22
  • https://sec.stealthcopter.com/cve-2020-28243
  • https://saltproject.io/security_announcements/active-saltstack-cve-release-2021-feb-25
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/YOGNT2XWPOYV7YT75DN7PS4GIYWFKOK5
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/FUGLOJ6NXLCIFRD2JTXBYQEMAEF2B6XH

entry.title: [salt] SaltStack Salt command injection via a crafted process name
entry.content:
An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. The minion's restartcheck is vulnerable to command injection via a crafted process name. This allows for a local privilege escalation by any user able to create a files on the minion in a non-blacklisted directory.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-28243
  • https://github.com/stealthcopter/CVE-2020-28243

entry.title: [salt] SaltStack Salt Directory Traversal vulnerability
entry.content:
An issue was discovered in through SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. The salt.wheel.pillar_roots.write method is vulnerable to directory traversal.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-25282
  • https://github.com/saltstack/salt/releases
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2021/11/msg00009.html

entry.title: [salt] SaltStack Salt Directory Traversal vulnerability
entry.content:
An issue was discovered in through SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. The salt.wheel.pillar_roots.write method is vulnerable to directory traversal.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-25282
  • https://github.com/saltstack/salt/releases
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2021/11/msg00009.html
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2022/01/msg00000.html
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/202103-01
  • https://www.debian.org/security/2021/dsa-5011
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/162058/SaltStack-Salt-API-Unauthenticated-Remote-Command-Execution.html
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/202310-22
  • https://saltproject.io/security_announcements/active-saltstack-cve-release-2021-feb-25
